root.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Rogue Spear (Platinum Pack)
root.description: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Rogue Spear (Platinum Pack)includes Rogue Spear and its mission pack: Urban Operations. Team Rainbow is back in full force in Rogue Spear, the thrilling sequel to Rainbow Six. Rogue Spear and its Mission Pack: Urban Operations blend spine-tingling tactics and explosive action into counter-terrorist warfare. Nothing comes closer to putting you in real life Special Forces action. It's so real; you'll be yelling Tango Down in your sleep for weeks.
